column33: Finder's fees and/or commissions of up to 10% of the Offering may be paid which could result in an aggregate of $1,200,000 in fees at the maximum offering (if finders/brokers place 100% of the offering). Only FINRA broker-dealers will receive commissions.
column51: We owe one of our officers $195,500 in accrued but unpaid salary. We have budgeted up to 2 years in officer/director salaries from proceeds of the offering.
